com.qualcomm.hardware

Class ModernRoboticsUsbServoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.hardware.ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
      • com.qualcomm.hardware.ModernRoboticsUsbServoController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.qualcomm.hardware.ReadWriteRunnable.Callback, HardwareDevice, ServoController

    public class ModernRoboticsUsbServoController
extends ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
implements ServoController
    Modern Robotics USB Servo Controller This is an implementation of ServoController. Use HardwareDeviceManager to create an instance of this class
